value:
$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|...Awake again? It's morning now.$k$pI brought water from the river.
You should drink.$k$pJust a sip, just a sip...$k$pNow...can you eat? I have some
nuts and fruit.$k$pYou need both rest and nourishment
if you want to recover, I hear.$k$pThough...where I heard that, I cannot
now recall. Still, it seems correct!$k$pI will take care of you, even if your
recovery takes some time.$k$pSo just try to eat and rest for the
moment, and you can thank me later,
once you feel better.$k$pNow, open up. You need food.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Normal,Face|Felix is like a little brother to me.
That's why I can't take him seriously.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|Are you worried about your
friends, $Nu?$k$pYou need not be. You will see them
again soon. Not just yet, though.$k$pWhen you traveled into the past,
you went much further than your
friends did.$k$pSo, even if you were to search for
them, you would not be able to find
them. They do not yet exist here.$k$pYou must wait. In 100 days and 100
nights, your friends will reappear...
Then, you may see them again.$k$pI know this because I am a goddess
of light. Light is time, and time is light.$k$pBe patient. Allow your wounds time
to heal. Time will reunite you with
your friends before long...$k$p$Sbs150|
